elements.characterName: A basic explanation of the tutorials. There's no need to memorize everything from the beginning. Just take a peek when you're curious.
Explains which buttons are used during battle.
The most basic of movements for any unit.
A basic rundown of how to perform attacks.
The health gauge for each unit.
A gauge that displays the amount of heat built up per attack.
Required for actions using the D button.
A special dash used to close the distance between you and your target.
A special dash that lets you move faster than normal.
Your attacks can change based on both your movement type and the distance from your enemies.
A technique that allows you to crush enemies quickly through consecutive attacks.
Combos can be performed simply by using the same button.
A cool technique where you continue to blast the enemy after knocking them into the air.
Damage received increases the more the heat gauge builds up.
Required to perform incredibly powerful moves.
Allows you to pull off a sequence of powerful combos.
Explains how to launch another physical based attack the moment the previous one connects.
Explains how to launch another firearm based attack just before the previous one ends.
Certain attacks change when holding down the attack button.
Some attacks become more powerful the more the heat gauge builds up.
A useful technique that allows you to forcefully cancel attacks with specific timing.
The rate at which your heat gauge decreases is based on your unit's movement.
Be careful when your heat gauge goes past its limit.
You can even EX cancel during force crashes.
You can cancel from one force crash into another.
